original_text: The earth was without form and void, and darkness was over the face of the deep. And the Spirit of God was hovering over the face of the waters.
korean_text: 땅이 혼돈하고 공허하며 흑암이 깊음 위에 있고 하나님의 영은 수면 위에 운행하시니라

sentences.original_text: The earth was without form and void
sentences.korean_translation: 땅은 형태도 없고 텅 비어 있었다

sentences.original_text: and darkness was over the face of the deep
was hovering over the face of the waters
